00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 #include <string.h>
00037 #include "mscb.h"
00038 #include "usb.h"
00039 
00040 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 
00042 unsigned char xdata usb_tx_buf[EP1_PACKET_SIZE];
00043 unsigned char xdata usb_rx_buf[EP2_PACKET_SIZE];
00044 unsigned char n_usb_rx, i_rs485_tx, i_rs485_rx;
00045 
00046 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 
00048 extern void watchdog_refresh(void);
00049 
00050 /*---- MSCB commands -----------------------------------------------*/
00051 
00052 #define MCMD_ADDR_NODE8  0x09
00053 #define MCMD_ADDR_NODE16 0x0A
00054 #define MCMD_ADDR_BC     0x10
00055 #define MCMD_ADDR_GRP8   0x11
00056 #define MCMD_ADDR_GRP16  0x12
00057 #define MCMD_PING8       0x19
00058 #define MCMD_PING16      0x1A
00059 
00060 #define MCMD_INIT        0x20
00061 #define MCMD_GET_INFO    0x28
00062 #define MCMD_SET_ADDR    0x34
00063 #define MCMD_SET_BAUD    0x39
00064 
00065 #define MCMD_FREEZE      0x41
00066 #define MCMD_SYNC        0x49
00067 #define MCMD_UPGRADE     0x50
00068 #define MCMD_USER        0x58
00069 
00070 #define MCMD_ECHO        0x61
00071 #define MCMD_TOKEN       0x68
00072 #define MCMD_SET_FLAGS   0x69
00073 
00074 #define MCMD_ACK         0x78
00075 
00076 #define MCMD_WRITE_NA    0x80
00077 #define MCMD_WRITE_ACK   0x88
00078 
00079 #define MCMD_FLASH       0x98
00080 
00081 #define MCMD_READ        0xA0
00082 
00083 #define MCMD_WRITE_BLOCK 0xB5
00084 #define MCMD_READ_BLOCK  0xB9
00085 
00086 #define GET_INFO_GENERAL   0
00087 #define GET_INFO_VARIABLE  1
00088 
00089 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00090 
00091 #define RS485_FLAG_BIT9      (1<<0)
00092 #define RS485_FLAG_NO_ACK    (1<<1)
00093 #define RS485_FLAG_SHORT_TO  (1<<2)
00094 #define RS485_FLAG_LONG_TO   (1<<3)
00095 #define RS485_FLAG_CMD       (1<<4)
00096 
00097 unsigned char rs485_flags;
00098 
00099 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00100 
00101 void setup(void)
00102 {
00103    unsigned char i;
00104 
00105    XBR0 = 0x01;                 // Enable RX/TX
00106    XBR1 = 0x40;                 // Enable crossbar
00107    P0MDOUT = 0x90;              // P0.4: TX, P0.7: RS485 enable Push/Pull
00108    P0SKIP  = 0x0C;              // Skip P0.2&3 for Xtal
00109    P0MDIN  = 0xF3;              // P0.2&3 as analog input for Xtal
00110 
00111    OSCXCN = 0;
00112    OSCICN |= 0x03;              // Configure internal oscillator for
00113                                 // its maximum frequency
00114 
00115    CLKMUL = 0x00;               // Select internal oscillator as
00116                                 // input to clock multiplier
00117 
00118    CLKMUL |= 0x80;              // Enable clock multiplier
00119    for (i=0 ; i<100 ; i++);     // Delay for >5us
00120    CLKMUL |= 0xC0;              // Initialize the clock multiplier
00121 
00122    while(!(CLKMUL & 0x20));     // Wait for multiplier to lock
00123 
00124    CLKSEL |= USB_4X_CLOCK;      // Select USB clock
00125    CLKSEL |= SYS_INT_OSC;       // Select system clock
00126 
00127    /* enable watchdog */
00128    PCA0MD = 0x00;               // disable watchdog
00129    PCA0CPL4 = 255;              // 71.1 msec
00130    PCA0MD = 0x40;               // enable watchdog
00131 
00132    /* enable reset pin and watchdog reset */
00133    RSTSRC = 0x09;
00134 
00135    /* start system clock */
00136    sysclock_init();
00137 
00138    /* init memory */
00139    RS485_ENABLE = 0;
00140 
00141    /* initialize UART0 */
00142    uart_init(0, BD_115200);
00143 
00144    /* Blink LEDs */
00145    led_blink(0, 5, 150);
00146    led_blink(1, 5, 150);
00147 
00148    /* invert first LED */
00149    led_mode(0, 1);
00150 
00151    /* dummy to prevent linker error */
00152    delay_us(1);
00153 }
00154 
00155 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00156 
00157 void serial_int(void) interrupt 4 using 1
00158 {
00159    if (TI0) {
00160       TI0 = 0;
00161 
00162       /* transmit next byte */
00163       i_rs485_tx++;
00164       if (i_rs485_tx < n_usb_rx)
00165          SBUF0 = usb_rx_buf[i_rs485_tx];
00166       else {
00167          /* end of buffer */
00168          RS485_ENABLE = 0;
00169          i_rs485_tx = n_usb_rx = 0;
00170       }
00171    }
00172 
00173    if (RI0) {
00174       /* put received byte into buffer */
00175       usb_tx_buf[i_rs485_rx++] = SBUF0;
00176 
00177       RI0 = 0;
00178    }
00179 }
00180 
00181 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00182 
00183 void yield()
00184 {
00185    watchdog_refresh();
00186 }
00187 
00188 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00189 
00190 sbit led_0 = LED_0;
00191 sbit led_1 = LED_1;
00192 
00193 void execute()
00194 {
00195    if (usb_rx_buf[1] == MCMD_INIT) {
00196       /* reboot */
00197       RSTSRC = 0x10;
00198    }
00199 
00200    if (usb_rx_buf[1] == MCMD_ECHO) {
00201       /* return echo */
00202       led_blink(1, 1, 50);
00203       usb_tx_buf[0] = MCMD_ACK;
00204       usb_tx_buf[1] = 0;  // reserved for future use
00205       usb_send(usb_tx_buf, 2);
00206    }
00207 
00208    if (usb_rx_buf[1] == RS485_FLAG_CMD) {
00209       /* just blink LED, discard data */
00210       led_1 = !led_1;
00211    }
00212 
00213 }
00214 
00215 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00216 
00217 unsigned char rs485_send()
00218 {
00219    rs485_flags = usb_rx_buf[0];
00220 
00221    /* clear receive buffer */
00222    i_rs485_rx = 0;
00223 
00224    if (rs485_flags & RS485_FLAG_CMD) {
00225 
00226       /* execute direct command */
00227       execute();
00228       n_usb_rx = 0;
00229       return 0;
00230 
00231    } else {
00232 
00233       /* send buffer to RS485 */
00234 
00235       /* set bit9 */
00236       TB80 = (rs485_flags & RS485_FLAG_BIT9) > 0;
00237 
00238       RS485_ENABLE = 1;
00239       SBUF0 = usb_rx_buf[1];
00240       i_rs485_tx = 1;
00241    }
00242 
00243    return 1;
00244 }
00245 
00246 void rs485_receive()
00247 {
00248 unsigned char i, n;
00249 
00250    if (rs485_flags & RS485_FLAG_NO_ACK)
00251       return;
00252 
00253    n = 0;
00254    for (i = 0; i<100 ; i++) {
00255 
00256       /* check for PING acknowledge (single byte) */
00257       if ((usb_rx_buf[1] == MCMD_PING16 ||
00258            usb_rx_buf[1] == MCMD_PING16) &&
00259           i_rs485_rx == 1 && usb_tx_buf[0] == MCMD_ACK) {
00260 
00261          led_blink(1, 1, 50);
00262          usb_send(usb_tx_buf, 1);
00263          break;
00264       }
00265 
00266       /* check for normal acknowledge */
00267       if (i_rs485_rx > 0 && (usb_tx_buf[0] & MCMD_ACK) == MCMD_ACK) {
00268 
00269          n = usb_tx_buf[0] & 0x07;       // length is three LSB
00270          if (n == 7 && i_rs485_rx > 1)
00271             n = usb_tx_buf[1]+3;         // variable length acknowledge
00272          else
00273             n += 2;                      // add ACK and CRC
00274 
00275          if (i_rs485_rx == n) {
00276             led_blink(1, 1, 50);
00277             usb_send(usb_tx_buf, n);
00278             break;
00279          }
00280       }
00281 
00282       if (rs485_flags & RS485_FLAG_SHORT_TO)        // 200us for PING
00283          delay_us(2);
00284       else if (rs485_flags & RS485_FLAG_LONG_TO)    // 1 s for flash/upgrade
00285          delay_ms(10);
00286       else
00287          delay_us(100);                             // 10ms for other commands
00288    }
00289 
00290    /* send timeout */
00291    if (i == 100) {
00292       usb_tx_buf[0] = 0xFF;
00293       usb_send(usb_tx_buf, 1);
00294    }
00295 }
00296 
00297 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*\
00298 
00299   Main loop
00300 
00301 \*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00302 
00303 void main(void)
00304 {
00305    setup();
00306    usb_init(usb_rx_buf, &n_usb_rx);
00307    n_usb_rx = 0;
00308 
00309    do {
00310       yield();
00311 
00312       /* check for incoming USB data */
00313       if (n_usb_rx) {
00314 
00315          /* signal incoming data */
00316          led_blink(0, 1, 50);
00317          if (rs485_send()) {
00318 
00319             /* wait until sent */
00320             while (n_usb_rx)
00321                yield();
00322 
00323             /* wait for data to be received */
00324             rs485_receive();
00325          }
00326 
00327       }
00328 
00329    } while (1);
00330 
00331 }
